mapper.sql: id, comm_attri_name, comm_attri_column, comm_attri_type, length, effe_inval_state, decimal_dig, max_val, min_val, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into comm_attri_mage (id, comm_attri_name, comm_attri_column, comm_attri_type, length, effe_inval_state, decimal_dig, max_val, min_val, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, dict_val) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commAttriName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commAttriColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commAttriType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{effeInvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decimalDig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{minVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dictVal,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update comm_attri_mage
comm_attri_name = #{commAttriName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comm_attri_column = #{commAttriColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comm_attri_type = #{commAttriType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER},
effe_inval_state = #{effeInvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decimal_dig = #{decimalDig,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_val = #{maxVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
min_val = #{minVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
dict_val = #{dictVal,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update comm_attri_mage set comm_attri_name = #{commAttriName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comm_attri_column = #{commAttriColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comm_attri_type = #{commAttriType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effe_inval_state = #{effeInvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decimal_dig = #{decimalDig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_val = #{maxVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, min_val = #{minVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, dict_val = #{dictVal,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update comm_attri_mage set comm_attri_name = #{commAttriName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comm_attri_column = #{commAttriColumn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comm_attri_type = #{commAttriType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effe_inval_state = #{effeInvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, decimal_dig = #{decimalDig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_val = #{maxVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, min_val = #{minVal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT distinct t1.id, t1.comm_attri_name, t1.comm_attri_column, t1.remarks, t1.comm_attri_type, t1.length, t1.effe_inval_state, t1.sort FROM comm_attri_mage AS t1 LEFT JOIN comm_attri_set AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.attri_id
AND instr(t1.comm_attri_name,#{commAttriName}) != 0
AND instr(t1.effe_inval_state,#{effeInvalState}) != 0
AND t1.del_flag != '1'
ORDER BY t1.sort ASC
SELECT id,pid AS parentId,pids,comm_num,comm_catg_name,effe_inval_state FROM comm_mage WHERE del_flag != '1'
SELECT id,comm_attri_name,comm_attri_column,effe_inval_state AS effeInvalState FROM comm_attri_mage WHERE del_flag != '1'
SELECT comm_attri_column FROM comm_attri_mage WHERE comm_attri_column = #{commAttriColumn} AND del_flag != '1'

SELECT id,comm_attri_name,comm_attri_column,effe_inval_state,IFNULL(sort,'0') AS sort, comm_attri_type,length,dict_val,decimal_dig,max_val,min_val FROM comm_attri_mage
AND effe_inval_state != '1' AND del_flag != '1' AND comm_attri_type = '1'

SELECT cam.id,cam.comm_attri_name,cam.comm_attri_column,cam.effe_inval_state,IFNULL(cam.sort,'0') AS sort, cam.comm_attri_type,cam.length,cam.dict_val,cam.decimal_dig,cam.max_val,cam.min_val from comm_attri_set cas LEFT JOIN comm_attri_mage cam ON cam.id = cas.attri_id LEFT JOIN comm_mage cm ON cm.id = cas.comm_id WHERE cas.del_flag = '0' AND cas.comm_id = #{id} AND cam.effe_inval_state != '1' AND cam.del_flag != '1' AND cam.comm_attri_type = '1' AND cas.if_search = '0'
